pageProps.title: spacy-report
pageProps.teaser: Generates interactive reports for spaCy models.

data.title: spacy-report
data.slogan: Generates interactive reports for spaCy models.
data.description: The goal of spacy-report is to offer static reports for spaCy models that help users make better decisions on how the models can be used.
code_example: python -m spacy report textcat training/model-best/ corpus/train.spacy corpus/dev.spacy
data.author: Vincent D. Warmerdam
